website_summaries.verdict: Can be used for a lot of things, but it does cost quite a bit and isn't a solution as a gate for narrow areas.
pros: Makes a great wide gate, enclosure or playpen, or barrier to dangerous areas such as fireplaces
cons: Expensive, cumbersome to store, and wall hardware to attach it to walls is of poor quality

customer_reviews.title: Hardware package nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 1 star because of the lack to proper accessories and instructions to use with this "adjustable" gate. You could only use it with even number of panels. If you want to use odd number of panels you have to buy an accessory from their website, also that does not come with free shipping. We already pay a premium to buy this gate why not provide the "Harware package" with the product, since they have advertised this as "fully adjustable"? I'll be returning this product as this is not what I was expecting after going through all the trouble to find out that I need the "hardware package". Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: JSweet

customer_reviews.title: This puppy playpen has been fantastic for our 3 month old Lab who is chewing ...
customer_reviews.text: This puppy playpen has been fantastic for our 3 month old Lab who is chewing on everything! We don't want to always put him in his crate, if he is getting into mischief, but need to confine him to a safe area, & still allow him to play. We purchased a Classic Rib Doormat 36"x48" @ Ocean State Job Lot for $10 to put under it (in case of puppy accidents). We set it up 4'x26" rectangle which accomadates the mat. It is very sturdy & our Houdini pup has not escaped yet. Updated 11-8-15 with pictures regarding measurements. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: Misleading advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: The gate seems great, but they do not mention that you can only remove even number of panels. I bought the 6 panel version after reading in the advertisement and description that you can remove panels to make it fit in the space needed. Once the gate arrived and I tried to set it up, the instructions clearly say that you can only remove an even number of panels. You have to purchase separately sold hardware to remove an odd number of panels. Now this doesn't fit at all, I can't set it up, and they don't appear to sell the needed hardware on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: stephen d.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my 6 Month old!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl is growing faster than expected. She outgrew her bouncers and swings because she started sitting up early. She couldn't stay still in a standard traditional playard alone. At 5 months she began standing up really early. This gate has exceeded my expectations and with that said, I'm able to do house work and school work with 2 kids, in a safer and more convenient manner. This was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gate
customer_reviews.text: Customer service was very responsive on a positive note. One thing that i didnt like about it..i was going to use it wall to wall( like dividing a room in half) ..not a circle enclosure and the gate was placed on the first panel and i wasnt able to move it to the second panel which would be easier to enter through. The product is of good quality..just didnt work for what i visioned it would. I did contact the vendor but was referred to how to set up for the circle enclosure..i also checked if any videos to change panels out..but there wasnt any..only set up.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I tried a plastic gate but it didn't fit together properly (returned for refund). This metal gate system is a thousand times more secure! I love this gate! I bought 2 and put them together to form a 6ft x 6ft square playpen for my granddaughter who is 10 months old. She's not quite walking on her own, but she walks around the playpen holding onto the sides, and it doesn't move at all. You can't put a pricetag on the feeling of security I have when she is safe inside her playpen while I'm doing dishes or whatever. We even bought a Toddleroo gate for our stairs. Great quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: NebraskaBurger

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found a quality gate that I can depend on! I have a growing corgi puppy, who at 6 months, began escaping from smaller gates I've bought previously, every time she was left alone at home. After purchasing this gate, my corgi has not made one single escape. As matter of fact, she has not been able to even make it budge. It is very sturdy and even prevents climbing. It may seem expensive, but I assure you, it is worth every penny. Nothing is better than being able to leave your dog at home with a peace of mind that they are safe and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer V

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: Works great for screening off the play area from the area with stairs and other areas where a toddler could get into trouble. It's sturdy enough to withstand shaking by my 18 month old. Gate is easy enough for the adults to operate without being obvious. The pieces can be moved to either side of the gate so that the gate can be wherever you wish. There are rubber pieces on the bottoms of all the legs which prevent the yard from sliding on a tile floor. That might not work on carpet. One of the legs was missing the rubber piece and that's the reason for 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these gates to keep a new puppy confined to the family room. I’m pleasantly surprised by how sturdy they are. For now, I just have them free standing in front of both huge entryways into the room. My hope is that the puppy will be trained before he gets big enough to try to knock them down on his own, so I’m not planning to use wall attachments at this time. They are very substantial and with bends in them for upright sturdiness, barely even wiggle when opening the walk through gates, which are a must. They have not moved at all.....Kind of pricey but totally worth the piece of mind with the puppy training!
customer_reviews.author: AmyN2006

customer_reviews.title: Not This Gate.
customer_reviews.text: As a home childcare provider, I'm a bit of a connoisseur of baby gates. This gate is a nightmare to attach to the wall, and once it's there, it's about as sturdy as a sheet in the wind. Wish I had gone with any other version of this product, but I've already made Swiss cheese out of our walls attaching this gate so I guess it's staying (until one of my toddlers looks at it the wrong way and it gets knocked down anyways).
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great purchase. You can purchase more gates to make a larger space, but it's large already. We have used this indoors for our living room and outdoors while doing yard work. It's made of great material and is heavy duty. It's nice and heavy so when our 10 month old son does pullup's trying to climb out, it doesn't topple over him. The gate door opens easily and will automatically close if you leave it slightly open (like a magnet). I highly recommend this product and plan on buying more gates as our son gets older and needs more space to play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as previously ordered
customer_reviews.text: Edit** bought a third one that is the same as first and was able to return the second that was not the same. Bought one of these a couple months ago and loved it. Decided to order another one so I could connect them to their for a larger playpen and wall (which it said I could do) was sent a completely different gate and color that doesn’t connect to the last one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love the length but not the easiest to install
customer_reviews.text: So this product is perfect for enclosing half of a room that we wanted to convert to a nursery. We had a difficult time finding something long enough in length, to reach across the room, so we were very happy to find this, and at such an affordable price. This is perfect for keeping baby in and pets out. However, I deducting 1 star because it was a complete pain in the butt to install. The directions are not clear and can be confusing. We ended up finding a YouTube install video that helped us.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This works fantastically for my 30# dog!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gate for a new puppy that is coming into our home in a couple weeks. I tried it out this weekend on my 30# dog. She stands up leaning on it and it doesn't move! I'm so happy with this! When she was a puppy she climbed the playpen with the horizontal bars at 8 weeks old but this one holds her in as an adult! Note:. She is a jumper (she can jump straight on to my bathroom counters) and could easily jump this but because the baby gates have fallen so many times scarring her she won't jump gates. We will see if she jumps it when the puppy comes and she wants to play!
customer_reviews.author: QuelFace

customer_reviews.title: Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but quality product. I bought 3 of these to make a large play area for my son as he learned to crawl and eventually walk. These were a big part of us allowing him to develop comfortably. He was able to run "loose" in the large enclosed play area which helped him learn to crawl from one toy he wanted to another. He then learned to pull to stand by pulling on the bars. Eventually he got comfortable walking by cruising along the gates and then venturing off away from the gates. Plus I don't have to worry about him getting into something with the enclosed play area. Peace of mind for me and great for him too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't move the gate without ends falling off
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy about the end posts being left open/unfinished. The gate was at one end when I opened the product. When I read the questions about my item (3-in-1 metal superyard) it said you can move the gate. I moved the gate to the center where it should be to begin with, and now it has an open post on one side and the other side has no stabilizers. So now the end post comes out with ease. The metal bars themselves seem pretty solid. The company should send the extra stabilizers or at least offer them in the event you don't want the gate all the way to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Gate!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away with the quality of this gate! I expected to mount this gate to the walls of my living room to create a safe baby jail for my 8 month old. Upon unboxing the gate I have been using it free standing because it is so sturdy! I will eventually mount it but it is so easy to maneuver around the living room as a free standing gate right now! Additionally awesome is each panel can swing both directions to easily maneuver it into different shapes. There is also a door panel that will close behind you with ease. This gate has every detail to make this the PERFECT gate!
customer_reviews.author: Kodee

customer_reviews.title: Gray is the perfect color
customer_reviews.text: SUPER happy with this product. The gray looks great with my light gray floors and I am so happy they offer that color. It seems much softer then the stark white. They do have brackets avaliable to attach it to the wall. We are using it to block off an entire room while we are away so the dogs stay off the sofas when we are not home. It was so easy to install and is an accordion style so it is easy to fold back and pull out. It is a bit heavy, but that is great for the sturdiness. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: bailey

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to go around a fragile dollhouse that i do not want my very young grandchildren playing with unless under supervision. The dollhouse sits catty corner in a corner of my room so I needed a gate that I could shape around it creatively and also look nice. This gate is perfect and is very heavy duty. Was simple to set it up and shape it exactly to my needs. Now the girls can view the dollhouse without reaching it. When I let them play with it, I simply pull the gate to the side. The quality of it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Terry

customer_reviews.title: Durable + Safe + Attractive = Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: As the mother of two, I have seen my fair share of baby gates. This product is bar none. We bought it to protect my daughter from our wood stove. We installed the gate 4 years ago - it is still working great! It is secure. The door latches well even in the face of my 2 year old son pulling on it. Be sure the you engage the latch when leaving. The installation worked great. We screwed it into the two walls and along the floor. Ours is set up to span a corner. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to protect their children.
customer_reviews.author: jmmephd

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought It!
customer_reviews.text: I spent months looking for "Baby Container". The plastic ones had several reviews of toddlers cutting their fingers, the wooden ones are unreasonable expensive. This one was actually more than I really wanted to spend too. But we really like it. It was easy to install and move around. The wall mounts are easy. We removed two sections, easy. We use it to section off a corner of our livingroom for our 9 month old. The door has a spring-like close function that we do not like at all. But considering the gate is either closed, or we are with the baby, it isn't a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and setup!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this gated fence. I have an 18 and 1/2 year old toy poodle she has a hard time walking on our wood floors so I’ve cover the floor in the area she is restricted to with whelping pads so she can walk around a bedroom, the bathroom, hallway and entry way. I had boxes(as you can see) to block area off. I purchase a different fence, one made of plastic and it was horrible too stiff and hard to use. the gate wouldn’t work (it also looked so cheap). For 20 bucks more I got this great looking replacement. It is everything I could want. Thanks Toddleroo!
customer_reviews.author: Judane Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gate ever!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews for similar products that were airtle less expensive, but when I read the negative reviews they were enough to scare me. I'm so happy we splurged on this gate! Even when it's not bolted into the wall it's so super sturdy and contains my 11 month old well (even when he's bouncing while holding on to the rail).
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Vrana

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my now-walking grandson at 1 yr old. Since he's new at mobility - it had to be sturdy enough to support him while he stands up. Safe enough for me to run to the bathroom and have him out of sight for 2 minutes and worth what I spent on it. All is true! It's construction is flawless from what I can tell so far. Sturdy, portable, and as safe as something like this can be. There was more than enough room for my grandson, his toys and books and walking space. The door is smooth in its function and although he loves to close the door - he can't open it. Perfecto!
customer_reviews.author: JIP

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to block off an are outside for my dogs. I haven’t had a chance to install it but I’d do sturdy and heavy that I haven’t had to. A young dog probably could mock it over if not installed, I funkier about kids. I’ve used it to block the dog’s in for bath time and it’s great because I’m not struggling to hold the dog and wash them. It’s a quality product that I don’t hesitate to recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angela nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These are so sturdy and easy to adjust. Also they are higher than most barriers which is great since my little one is very tall for his age. They also look nicer than bulky plastic ones. I think even after he has outgrown them, they can be used for pets like if someone had a new puppy they were training. These are wonderful and I am so happy that I found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Safe, versatile, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December 2011, when a grandson was going to be at our house for an extended period. Then got it out again in 2014 when I was caring for a granddaughter once a week. Now I am caring for a new granddaughter three days a week. Brought it up from the basement and had no trouble remembering how to put it together. One of the best investments I have made.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B. Tarpley

customer_reviews.title: Very very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Ok this is a great gate! Perfect length, easy to install, very sturdy. I only needed 5 panels but it was super easy to unscrew the wall mounts and switch them out to make the 5 panels work. Literally the ONLY reason I’m not giving this a 5 is because of the doorway size. It is SUPER narrow. Like I’m not a big person at all 5’3 and about 120lbs but I have to turn sideways to walk through. My husband is 6’1 and about 240 so he definitely has to turn sideways haha. However even with the narrow doorway this was definitely the best gate to go across the large area I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Borowy

customer_reviews.title: Sold with only 1/2 the install parts.
customer_reviews.text: The gate is not inexpensive to purchase, but what is not told is it requires even number of panels to install. When we received the product I reduced the number of panels to 3 to span our opening. When I read the directions there is a note that states "To accommodate different sized openings, you can add or remove an even number of panels. Additional hardware is available for purchase when using an odd number of panels." That cost us an additional $12 and a 10 days for delivery. Beyond that it is reasonably sturdy and will do the job for a few years. I wish the opening was wider.
customer_reviews.author: M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our puppy. The yard is easy to set up. I did it in less than a minute, I think. Just take it out of the box. It unfolds and folds back easily. We've used it to block off parts of the house, cordon off Christmas trees or areas of a room from a teething puppy, and as a pen in the center of the living room. We've used it to keep children out of the kitchen at holiday times. This gate/fence has worked so well, other family members have bought one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Steele

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Child Gate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this child gate not for a child, but for a dog. I needed to protect as much of my home as I could from a foster dog who was not house broken. The product was sturdy and easy to install. I did not use the deals that can be used to attach the gate to the wall. It is heavy duty and ideal for my needs. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Theaterdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Great product: *Beware of choking hazard* -- small rubber feet
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, and we've been using it for about a week. PLEASE be careful of the small rubber feet that can easily come off while moving it. I dragged the enclosure about 3 feet within the same room and noticed this little rubber foot inside of the enclosure. Hopefully most rubber feet are more secure and this is a rare occurrence. I did not see a warning about these particular pieces in the manual, but I would be worried that my child could find one and plop it in her mouth without me noticing. These rubber pieces are slightly over 1/2 inch in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE ONLY LOOKING FOR A SINGLE GATE! You have to buy 3 or 4 gates if you want it to be like the picture on the box. Misleading product and advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing baby gate... at a cost.
customer_reviews.text: This gate is absolutely perfect.... you can easily adjust and move it any way, it’s sturdy and it holds. Love that you can mount to the wall. It keeps our dogs away from the baby’s play area upstairs. We had to buy the additional panels so at almost $150, this was a very expensive play yard. However- based on what my friends have and the other gates I’ve seen, this one is by far the best. If you want quality and you have the money to drop.... go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and sturdy gate. I use this to keep my dog contained and it's been great. It's pretty heavy and he can't budge it. The access panel is fantastic because I no longer have to step over a gate to get in and out of his area and worry about him getting stepped on or me falling to avoid stepping on the little guy because he immediately comes to where my foot is going. Just open the panel and walk right in.
customer_reviews.author: MsJulieATL

customer_reviews.title: the best gate we have EVER bought!
customer_reviews.text: used in a doorway to keep our large dogs back, they have always jumped on the old ones to try to get over or past them - not this one. its fantastic, sturdy in place & love the door. I would buy another one, it was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SmolWood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/ good purchase- recommended
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are awesome! They are sturdy. I worried that they would be falling/ leaning in the middle but that is not an issue at all! The manufacturers did fix the issue of not being able to attach to the wall with tall molding like some other reviews complained about. So that is good. They also fixed the issues with having the correct top pieces that connect to the top.
customer_reviews.author: S&H

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gate, just be sure the dimensions fit where you need it, and you should be all set.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gate/play yard. I've only seen one that I thought might be sturdier, but this is perfect for fencing off around a fireplace or in between rooms with a larger opening/doorway area for kids or dogs, and could easily be used as a play pen/play yard (we just didn't need it for the play pen purpose. Be sure to measure the opening/area you want to block off if using it as a fence/gate, and if it will fit, you'll be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works great & it’s adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I can remove the extra piece if I want but I chose to leave it attached and bend it between the island Chairs we never use anyway that way it’s already connected when I want to extend it in another direction. The 2nd pic by the trash can is where the gate is and It opens and closes easily push the button and lift a little I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Best baby-proof purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep baby away from tv stand. Delivered timely and without damage. Comes ready to use as a barrier, right out of the package. Minor work to be done to turn into a playpen. All pieces for mounting were in the box. When wrapped around, it is sturdy enough for baby to pull up on without mounting equipment. If a straight line, mounting equipment is necessary. Will buy another when baby shows us what else he can get into.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gate But Arrived with 2 Bent Bars
customer_reviews.text: Over all, this is a Nice Gate But it arrived with 2 Bent Bars which was disappointing after spending more $169.95 on this gate with 8 panels and 198-Inch long VS the other gate I was considering by Regalo 192-Inch Super Wide Adjustable Baby Gate and Play Yard, 4-In-1, Bonus Kit, Includes 4 Pack of Wall Mounts for only $87.99 We made it work using 1 less panel VS going through the hassle of Returning for another. I would also say that for the money charged, the gate door could have been a bit wider not to have to turn sideways while walking through it without your hips hitting the sides. I am not a big woman at 5'5" 135lb.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more!
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little more and get the Regalo and extension pieces if needed. This gate is very flimsy compared to the Regalo, and the latch is super annoying and inconvenient. The latch on the Regalo is a push button and lift. Super convenient when carrying something!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We put two of these together to create a larger play yard for our 9 month old grand daughter. I am a mechanical engineer (retired) and seldom see a product I don't think I could improve but this is one. It is well made, easy to reconfigure and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this baby gate. It works perfect for what we need. We have steps with no railing so I looked and looked for baby gates that'll work for us and not only did the Superyard 3-in-1 work for us but it is SO sturdy. I'm really surprised by it's sturdiness. It came very well packaged also!
customer_reviews.author: VH23

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for sanity during stay-at-home
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this the second day of both of us working from home and we realized that there was nothing from stopping him from going to the living area to the kitchen area and ripping out things from the cupboards and harassing the animals. The really nice thing is that it is big enough that he doesn't realize that he is confined. Also is extremely sturdy to the point that he uses it as a musical instrument to bash things with (it's really solid heavy metal).
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Cost vs quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I bought a similar item without the anti-slip and it just didnt feel the same. I felt cheated with the other product. Good quality and good instructions. Only downside is the price vs competitors. If you want a good quality and safe product, this is it. If price is an issue, look elsewhere - you won't have the same satisfaction as this one though.
customer_reviews.author: M.Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I was pretty skeptical that this gate could spread across the entire length of family room entry from dining and it would keep our dog out. I was pleasantly surprised. Our growing puppy (Lab) hasn’t come close to knocking it down. It’s sting and plenty heavy and sturdy. I just have it around an end table on one end and chair on other (didn’t need to anchor to wall at all). I keep it sort of zig zagged across the opening. It’s been great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Our Pup!
customer_reviews.text: This play yard has been PERFECT for our little pup! The vertical bars are strong and wide enough to keep our little guy from bending them with his bite. We didn't need to secure the ends to the wall with the way we had it under our stairwell. I was a little leery about the height of the yard because although he's a small dog with short legs, he is quite a jumper. Thankfully, he has not been able to jump over or knock it down....even though he's tried multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Titus3

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: this super yard has been a just the ticket for our puppy that seems to find every gate to jump over. He has a couple inches of growing yet so he may eventually jump over it but it is very well made, heavy and easy to use. so far it has been the only gate that keeps this little guy in!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 3rd one of these. The 1st two we are using to gate off our living room as a play area for our son and they work beautifully! So sturdy! We ordered the 3rd one for our fireplace in our family room. I debated on buying a cheaper one, but decided to go with this gate again because it's such great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Wish I would have known about this for my first child LOL. Extremely sturdy without even anchoring to wall it doesn’t even need to be! Easy to put together it almost comes that way anyway! Gate is awesome and easy to open and close but my toddler can’t and she tried to shake the bars and even with it not attached to the wall it didn’t even move! Doesn’t get warm from the fire either!
customer_reviews.author: Gary tagmyer

customer_reviews.title: Great dog pen.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to hold two Pomeranian dogs and I love the self closing gate. The gate opening is big and opens close to the floor so less tripping hazard. The panels are put together with a pole that tightens so the joints will not flex, making it much more stable and hold the shape that the pen is set at. Looks nice and does not damage floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durability .
customer_reviews.text: My only problem with the product is the gate. The top latch does not fully lock.the assembly for the latch was assembled upside down so the prongs do not properly close allowing the gate to be opened without pressing the button on the top. The gate will still latch on the bottom and do a partial latch on the top for a self-service close. The rest of the setup for this product is well put together and I order two sets because of this. The second set arrived today and I will be unpacking it tomorrow to see if I have the same issue with the gate.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Best gate ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this gate. It was recommended to me and well worth it. We took two pieces off because we didn't need it that long. Easy to install and take pieces apart. It is very sturdy and does the job. Our daughter pushes and dances on it and we only have the top bracket in the wall for now.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Noti

customer_reviews.title: Life saver! Just one thing.....
customer_reviews.text: I wished the brackets to attach to the walls for installation were horizontal and not vertical. I think that is what really made it a challenge to ensure sturdiness and stability. I have the gate stretched across a 9 foot walkway. Other than that, I have no other complaints. It have saved a bit of my sanity when looking after my 1 1/2 yr old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: jeanne m gabel

customer_reviews.title: WHAT AN INCREDIBLE LIFE SAVINGS ITEM!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so versatile that it can go straight across upon to 144 inches of made in an octagon figure. This is quality made and is appropriate for either children or pets. This is among the best purchase I have ever made!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 month old daughter. The plastic gates just weren't doing the trick. This metal gate is very sturdy!! Especially when attached to the wall. The door doesn't like to latch on its own but if you wiggle it a bit it latches pretty well. It does have the option to force the door to stay open. It is easy to fold up and store. We are taking it down once a day to clean floors.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Adam

customer_reviews.title: Barrier for Elderly, too!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually take the time to write reviews, but this product is awesome! It came with extra connectors for different configurations + hardware to attach to wall - very helpful. And I love the self closing gate. I bought this to keep my dogs out of my open dining room. I have 5 dogs, and it's effective from the Boxer down to the Chihuahua. Although unintentional for my purchase, it has also been GREAT to keep my elderly mother (with Alzheimer's) from accessing the back door off the dining room! So many times she's exited the house without detection and wandered into the yard unaccompanied. This sturdy barrier has given me so much more peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Solid!
customer_reviews.text: This gate is very stable. We have it blocking off a wide doorway. My 1 year old can pull to stand and walk along it while holding the bars. The bars on the gate were thoughtfully placed and there are no accidental finger pinch points if we open/close the gate with her grabbing nearby. Super easy to remove panels! Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Only mounts even number of sections
customer_reviews.text: If mounting to the wall, you can only use an even number of sections. I needed an odd number. Called the company and they charged me way too much to order a full mounting kit even though I need only 1 small plastic piece. If wall-mounting, keep in mind the width you need and how many gate sections will work. If you need an odd number, you will be paying a little bit more for this gate.
customer_reviews.author: matho

customer_reviews.title: Instructions for creating the pen/enclosed version are impossible
customer_reviews.text: The latch on the gate is good compared to other models I have had. The directions on how to make it into a pen are nearly impossible and I'm a pretty smart cookie. I had to call customer service for an assist, but they were so backlogged they had to call me back. An hour later when they called back I had finally figured it out on my own but I definitely spent a lot of time I'll never get back trying to figure it out. Once it's together, it's heavy duty. I use it for a rambunctious pup. Added a floor from the pet store and cut out a wooden top and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Used as barrier around fireplace.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy! I didn't even have to install it using the hooks and it still works just fine around my fireplace. 10 month old Baby stands and pushes himself into it and it doesn't budge. Simple to use, easy to install right out of the box and not an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Fanny B. Cacho

customer_reviews.title: Expensive fence not to include additional parts.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that there was limited trouble shooting facts for the installation of the fence. I read the directions several time to discover that you must purchase additional equipment for odd number of fence panels. This fence is already expensive for the manufacture not to include additional parts for odd panels. FYI: here are some hints for installation see photos.
customer_reviews.author: Cv

customer_reviews.title: Really Is A SUPERyard!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a total of 4 of these gates/play yards. I am extremely pleased with the quality and ease of use of this product. They connect very easily to one another to create a larger area and they store away well. I recently purchased one for a friend's baby shower and she LOVED it. She will get many years of use out of this item. The three I have connected at my home have created a play/outdoor area for my two Morkies. The pups can go outside at their leisure with the Gate opening placed on either side of the exterior sliding doors. If I ever needed another gate I would certainly purchase yet another North States Superyard
customer_reviews.author: Sbumom324

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy gate. I don’t have mine anchored into the wall but it still keeps my toddlers out of my kitchen and crafting area. It has a lock position to keep it from automatically swinging closed too. Would buy again. Worth saving my sanity. My husband’s more so!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made. No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect height and very well made. I’ve bought others in the past and this is the best yet. I use it to keep my pups on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Labonte

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to assembly. Great price. Super sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Got this gate for our pups. The gate is super simple to set up out of the box. I started with a circular enclosure,and as my pups grew to 50+ lbs I know have this in a straight line, dividing the room (fastened to the walls). The dogs constantly jump on it and it has taken the force.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for occasional use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our medium-large size dog. Really good quality, a bit heavy. Long enough stretched out to cross a driveway to keep him in the back yard or out of a room. He could definitely jump it, but if we fastened it to the wall with the hardware I don’t think he could knock it over. The gate could be smoother to latch and unlatch-this is the one thing keeping it from being 5 stars. I wouldn’t want to put this in an area where I had to open and close the gate frequently with my hands full.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love this gate!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a gate to protect our toddler from the fireplace and this works great. The gate is quality and has held up really well, even with a toddler trying to break in. It screws into the wall so it really fits into those oddly shaped spaces. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hetchler

customer_reviews.title: Well made, safe and versatile
customer_reviews.text: My precocious 10 month old is contained with this gate. He continuously tries to climb it, but has yet to succeed. It is very sturdy and the ability to change the way it is configured is so helpful!!! Very versatile. I have converted my sunroom into a playroom and the doorway is very wide, this gate is perfect to keep my little one safe
customer_reviews.author: Monica T Long

customer_reviews.title: Well made and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really well made. Does the job well of forming temporary barrier/play yard. Our kids learnt to stand up holding these bars. Can get tippy when pulled very strongly on the ends. This can be mostly mitigated by either securing with something stationary.
customer_reviews.author: Bharat Ravisekar

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install, perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this gate to keep the dogs separated from the cats things, namely their cat tree as one of our dogs has already torn apart a cat tree and multiple cat toys and beds. The dogs have not been able to get over it with how we have the gate set up and it seems very sturdy! My husband installed it super quick and easy and it was worth every penny, I highly recommend this gate!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The doors don’t click in at all!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two set of the 6-panel pins. They were easy to install and sturdier than the plastic ones. I chose this one particularly because I read lots of reviews saying that babies’ limbs got caught in between the gaps of other play pins. However, this one didn’t avoid this issue. My baby’s legs constantly got stuck in between the medal bars. It caused the redness and swelling on her legs! Maybe this pin is better for walking babies...
customer_reviews.author: William Seals

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Pets!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the times to keep our foster dogs confined to a particular area. It's very durable and they can't chew through it like the wooden ones. I like that you can shape it countless different ways since it has so many 'joints'. It also folds up easily so you can pack it away in a closet once you are finished. A word of caution for anyone who might have trouble picking things up - it is on the heavier side. That can be expected for something so large and built to be sturdy, but just thought I would mention it.
customer_reviews.author: NolaRieRie

customer_reviews.title: Works phenomenally!
customer_reviews.text: We got this to put in front of our door so that we could stop worrying about our dogs trying to run outside (we are very protective over them!). We have medium-sized dogs and they haven't jumped over this gate once! Definitely worth every penny for that alone. Do be aware that it requires you to screw it into the wall, which can be a little bit tedious. But again, it is above and beyond worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Darien & Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It fits across a two car garage door!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to put across my two car garage door opening so my dog could come out there while I work on things and I don’t have to worry about him wandering off. It fits which is awesome, and is so nice! Very heavy duty and easy to use/put together! I can’t imagine you would have any issues with using it for kids either!
customer_reviews.author: Cayce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This super yard surpassed my expectations. It is heavy and very sturdy. My 1 year old twin grandchildren cannot open this gate and cannot push the play yard around much. I have it placed on an area rug that is smooth so it will slide a little when pushed hard by two rough little toddler boys. I purchased one extension as the original layout is too small to me. I should have purchased a second extension. However, that is just a personal preference for how much space I wanted. The gate does automatically close as it states. It's taller than other plastic play yards.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worths the price
customer_reviews.text: Something I wouldn't buy once I see the price. But my sister got one and I really liked it when I saw the actual product. I bought one myself and am really happy that I got this product. I used to use the ones made of metal and those scratched the floor. This one is much easier on the floor and it's stronger than it looks and feels.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great pruchase
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with how the Superyard looks, how sturdy it is and the confidence that it will protect our grandson from hurting himself on our rock fireplace. The issue we had with it is the fact that it did not have clear instructions on how to mount it plus it did not seem to have the correct mounts. The only improvement that I would suggest is to make the Superyard where it can be easily collasped from the wall for easy storage without having to unscrew the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Mills

customer_reviews.title: One end not very secure
customer_reviews.text: One of the sides doesn't seem to securely fasten to the wall. It's simply a cap that you move the gate underneath and have to snap into place. It strong enough to withstand a 2 year old but I would worry about a child larger than that throwing their body weight against the gate.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We are incredibly happy with out purchase of this gate/pen. It holds up well against our tank of an 18mo old daughter (35 lbs). We have it assembled in the free standing pen and occasionally she is able to shift it slightly on the play foam pads we have it on but not enough for me to question if it will keep her safe or not. She actually loves going into it and having the extra room and stability of the floor that her old play pen didn't give her. We are incredibly happy and so is baby girl!
customer_reviews.author: paige

customer_reviews.title: Great, high quality, well designed play yard
customer_reviews.text: This is the best quality play yard I could find. It's the tallest, which is great for my super tall baby. And it's very sturdy, with each corner locking into place to help keep the shape. And with no horizontal bars there's no where for my kiddo to stick his feet to try to climb out. I'm planning on installing one around our fireplace, since it's the perfect size and can be mounted to the wall. The gated part opens and closes smoothly, though I wish it was a bit wider for me and husband to get through. One of the best things I purchased for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tova

customer_reviews.title: Anti escape proof for a monkey or 1 year baby boy.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing great wonderful works great Back story my little monkey/ escape artist can not climb up and over it like some of the other ones we have tried. It is tall enough that my great Dane who is one 1.5 years old so still full of that puppy clumsiness cant knock it over. So it is great
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not flimsy like many other gates
customer_reviews.text: Great flexibility of use, solid and it's nice have a functional gate to go through rather than having to step over it. A little tricky to open the gate at first as you need to lift as you press the button. Once you figure that out, it's no problem. Only weakness is the bottom latch of the gate doesn't lock cleanly when it closes. It doesn't allow pets to get out when that happens, just that you would have better peace of mind if it did and less annoyance to play with it to make sure it is locked well.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Samuelsen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Be Fooled - Pieces NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Product did NOT come with any screws, wall pieces, floor spacer, installation template or manual. The only thing in the amazon box was the gate. Unable to use it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.  Great for wall-to-wall barrier.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this wall-to-wall to block our toddler from getting at our TV, other electronics, etc. Very easy to install. When our kid was a little smaller, we just had it free-standing (in a sort of zig-zag pattern for some stability), and this actually worked pretty well (never tipped over despite our child's best attempts). We later attached it to the walls with the included hardware, and it is now extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: ACH

customer_reviews.title: I like how it would stay open on its own
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep child away from wood stove. We don't use the gate door anymore but when we did, I like how it would stay open on its own. Have used it in many different situations before affixing it to the wall around the stove and it was great every time. Very sturdy and durable. Would definitely recommend and would buy again if I needed to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more poop in my yard!! Yippee!
customer_reviews.text: Best Gate from pooping dogs!! I bought this great gate to keep my rude neighbors dog from pooping in my yard ! Well made and strong!! Great price and a Godsend from Amazon! Thank you! Feeling blessed and happy again!
customer_reviews.author: L. Montes

customer_reviews.title: and it was easy to conform to the size we needed
customer_reviews.text: We installed this gate to keep our new corgi puppy away from our two dwarf rabbits. The rungs are close enough together that the animals can't squeeze through, and it was easy to conform to the size we needed. The door is very secure: Easy to unlock with one hand, but it would be too difficult for a toddler to figure out (their little fingers wouldn't have enough strength to depress the unlock button,probably). The only thing I'd note is that the doorway is a little thin, so if you have shorter legs (like me), you have to turn sideways to get through the opening because it's too small for most adult hips. I would definitely order this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Castonguay

customer_reviews.title: Best gate out there
customer_reviews.text: This company makes the best gates, honestly everything else we have tried is no match. These are durable gates. We used this one around our gas fireplace. Our fireplace doesn’t get too hot but if our Little One touched it he would get burned. The gate doesn’t maintain a hot conduction level either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: contains 13 month old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these fences to have fenced off areas of the house. With the extension it's big enough for an adult and baby. I also added extra so a couple adults and baby can hang out (or enough room for baby to walk around).
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: These gates are very well designed and high quality. ...
customer_reviews.text: These gates are very well designed and high quality. The off white color is a little more subtle looking in my living room than regular white would be. I bought a second one for the other side of our room. Contrary to some of the reviews, they ARE freestanding w/o being bolted to the wall or being connected in a circle - just as long as you zigzag or curve them a little instead of putting in a straight line.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, a real company with C.S.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the $30 wire pen first, returned it and bought this along with 2 extra panels to use as an 8 panel puppy pen. Sturdy, keep their shape, more expensive than the $25-35 ones, but a much better product. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PJK

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 month old and we have had this installed for about 2 months now. He routinely picks himself up using the bars and just holds onto the bars while standing. The gate/bars haven't moved at all so I anticipate we will have this up for years to come. The installation takes a little time but that's due to needing to drill screws into the wall; so its expected. The only downside is you can't remove just one gate, or three gates. You have to remove an even number of gates or else you won't be able to install into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dence

customer_reviews.title: Takes some time to setup, but is worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for a little frustration in where you can connect the door. Other than that, this is rigid and works very well for keeping our very active daughter "constrained". We currently have this setup around a large living room, and it is very stable. I'm glad for some of the other reviews that talked about the "male-female" pieces. Just understand that you can convert any end to male/female with the 1 extra set in the box, and you'll be fine. It takes a few minutes, but is worth it. It could be longer, but for the price and because it is metal, I'd just order a couple sets to fill the space.
customer_reviews.author: ghallo

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gate ever.. Price jump I paid 65.95 for the not 100
customer_reviews.text: We have an English bulldog who seems to love to chew on things when we are not home I absolutely hated leaving him in a small kennel so purchase two of these gates to make a nice size play yard for him inside when we're not home. These gates are terrific durable large and easy to assemble and disassemble we will also be using it for camping trips as a dog yard. Would absolutely purchase this again without hesitation. I also have a home daycare and use it all the time for children. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: cna

customer_reviews.title: Love this gate
customer_reviews.text: We like this gate so much we bought 2 :) We’ve purchased other plastic gates in the past and they were difficult to bend and would break at the hinges. The panels on this gate are easy to maneuver and very sturdy. I like how the door remains open and can close with just a nudge. Size of door has not been a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: CDaisyF

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. We have a small dog and a 1 year old grandchild. Both can move freely around and no worries about them falling off deck. 1 year old has even tried shaking it. It’s very sturdy. Product recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Cares41

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great long gate for big openings. Easy to mount to the wall. The only one problem I had was because we needed an odd number of panels and you needed to order “extra hardware” except; the site for north gates didn’t carry them. There was a number to call but figured out you can unscrew the things at the end of the extra panel you didn’t need and screw them to the end you needed them to be on. Just had to play around a bit here and there. Didn’t need to order any “additional hardware”. But I love north gate. I have one other gate that is very well made from them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Functions well
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are rather vague, however once I figured out how to connect/disconnect the panels, it proved fairly simple. The only thing I was disappointed in was that using it with an odd number of panels (for a wood stove barrier) requires purchase of additional hardware to complete the ends. (Or, requires taking the parts off the removed panel and using them.) Once I overcame that one glitch, I found the structure to be solid, and was pleased with how the gate works.
customer_reviews.author: Montana

product_meta.title: Toddleroo by North States 3 in 1 Metal Superyard: 144" long extra wide baby gate, barrier or play yard. Hardware or freestanding. 6 panels, 10 sq.ft. enclosure (30" tall, Beige)
product_meta.description: Size:6-Panel SuperyardHave oodles of options while keeping your child safe and secure using the Toddleroo by North States 3-in-1 Metal Superyard. The versatile, six-panel enclosure can act as a portable play yard, a gate or a barrier. As a play yard, it encloses up to 10 square feet and is 30 inches high. The 3-in-1 Metal Superyard is free-standing and sets up in seconds, plus it can be used inside on a variety of floor surfaces and won’t slip or scratch. For added convenience, the 3-in-1 Metal Superyard can also be hardware mounted as an extra-wide barrier in your home or a gate, blocking off fireplaces, displays, etc. You’ll be thrilled with its many options to fit your busy lifestyle! The one swinging walk-thru panel is built with a child-proof double-locking system allowing easy access. If you’d like to increase the overall size, a two-panel extension is available separately.
feature_bullets: NEW NAME - SAME GREAT BRAND YOU TRUST: The Toddleroo by North States 3-in-1 Metal Superyard is versatile and reliable - acting as a portable playpen, a baby gate or a safety barrier. Works on carpet, tile, hardwood floors, etc. without scratching.
SAFETY & CONVENIENCE: The free-standing enclosure sets up in seconds, and the swinging walk-thru door panel has a child-proof double-locking system allowing secure, easy access.

MODERN FEATURES FOR MODERN HOMES: The mounting hardware accommodates extra-tall baseboards, can be mounted to angled walls, and can be infinitely extended with extension panels (sold separately) to span extra wide areas.
CONFIGURABLE FOR A VARIETY OF SPACES:The 3in1 Superyard has configurable panels that lock into place to fit any play area. Change the space, change the shape! This play yard has infinite options.
BABY SAFE: Safe for babies ages 6-24 months. This item includes mounting hardware, to create an extra-wide baby gate, or a safety barrier to protect babies from fireplaces or other hazards.

VERSATILE AND SECURE-This item can easily be set up as a free standing play yard. For extra security as a hardware- mount barrier please follow the enclosed instructions, using the included hardware and screws.

specifications.Safety warning: Check the included instruction manual for a complete list of safety warnings. You will also find the PDF of the manual on the Amazon listing
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,084 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
